commentAnnotations.sourceSection: Table of Contents - Section 6.2.7 Number of Study Centers
Table of Contents - Section 8 Data Management

commentAnnotations.text: For the purposes of this study, the patient will only be monitored for any newly diagnosed skin condition (e.g., dermatitis, abrasion) at the site of the study device use throughout the duration of subjects' participation in the study.

A planned hospitalization for pre-existing condition without a serious deterioration in health or to prevent life threatening illness or injury or permanent impairment to a body structure or a body function, is not considered to be a SAE.

studyDefinitionDocumentVersions.description: Clinical Investigation Plan for AION BIOSYSTEMS tempshield continuous temperature monitoring device study in Pediatric Emergency Department
